comments.creator: philringnalda@gmail.com
comments.text: Unless you serve it as application/xhtml+xml, you can only omit the end tag for an element that's declared as EMPTY in HTML. iframe is not empty, so when you are serving XHTML as text/html, you need to follow http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/#C_3
comments.raw_text: Unless you serve it as application/xhtml+xml, you can only omit the end tag for an element that's declared as EMPTY in HTML. iframe is not empty, so when you are serving XHTML as text/html, you need to follow http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/#C_3
comments.author: philringnalda@gmail.com
holger_gehrke@freenet.de
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #1)
In this case I'll have to complain to the authors of tidy, cause it didn't show me the error of my ways ... ;-)
